snippet: Political tussling over the long-awaited Greek debt deal led to a day of sharp declines on Wall Street and the S.& P. 500’s first weekly loss this year.
abstract: Stock indexes decline amid a disheartening euro debt picture.
lead_paragraph: Political tussling over the long-awaited Greek debt deal led to a day of sharp declines on Wall Street and the S.& P. 500’s first weekly loss this year.

headline.main: Stocks Down Sharply on Doubts Over Greece
headline.print_headline: Market Run Is Halted On Doubts About Europe
